and.attribute: Lot J2, Street No. 8, Song Than IP 1, Di An, Binh Duong

1. Job Overview Position Title: Manager – Business Development Corporate Unit: Schenker Vietnam Co. Ltd Department: Logistics/SCM Location: Song Than and Ho Chi Minh City Reporting to: Director Contract Logistics/SCM Staff Responsibility: Yes (1 staff) 2. Role Summary To win and implement new contract logistics business. 3 Specific Accountabilities • lead and develop the BD department • develop a strong BD pipeline • lead the implementation of new business • establish relationship with target customers in target verticals • tender management (RFI, RFQ) incl solution design, calculation and pricing • organize & lead meetings with potential customers • work closely with regional BD team • any other projects related to the development of contract logistics business as assigned by the management • process design and cost calculation • prepare presentations and tender response documents

4 Required Skills • proactive person with a drive to accomplish targets • able to deliver solutions and meet deadlines in a complex & fast paced environment • open minded and creative • able to interact well with different staff levels in the organization 5 Experience and Qualifications • Bachelor or Masters Degree in relevant commercial or technical field • understanding of warehousing, transport and freight forwarding operations, hands on experience an advantage • minimum 3 years experience in a similar role in a 3PL • understanding of Supply Chain Management • excellent written and spoken English • well verse with MS office applications

DIV.H3: Schenker Vietnam Co. Ltd Lot J2, Street No. 8, Song Than IP 1, Di An, Binh Duong

and.attribute: DB Schenker has been providing transportation and logistics solutions in Vietnam for over 20 years. In 1991, DB Schenker started operations in Vietnam through a representative office. In 2008, Schenker Vietnam Co., Ltd. was formally registered. Since then, the company has grown to 10 locations countrywide and currently employs more than 500 people. DB Schenker has built a strong reputation as one of Vietnam’s preferred logistic providers. It services top global brands in various industries such as electronics, semiconductor, fashion, FMCG, pharmaceuticals and healthcare, to name a few. The core services of DB Schenker in Vietnam include Air Freight, Ocean Freight, Ground Transportation and Logistics and Supply Chain Solutions provided by an international team of experts and professionals. Complex industries and vertical markets are allocated with dedicated specialist teams focused on delivering solutions. At DB Schenker, we welcome individuals who share our organization’s passion for excellence. With over 2,000 locations in about 130 countries around the globe, we offer a wealth of opportunities for our employees. Our global network and solid local operations allow various career opportunities for the right individuals. For our Logistics/SCM team in the South we are looking for a BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER.
